entities.name: portkey office
entities.description: The Portkey Office is mentioned as a location where people are getting in and out of. It is described as the place where the lift doors opened.

entities.name: apparation test center
entities.description: The Apparition Test Center is mentioned as a location where people are getting in and out of. It is not clear if it is the same as the Portkey Office or a different place.

entities.name: witches
entities.description: Witches are mentioned as one of the groups of people who got out of the lift. They are described as four or five in number.

relationships.description: The witches exited from the Portkey Office, as indicated by the phrase 'got out'.
The witches also exited from the Apparition Test Center, although it is not clear if this is a different location or the same as the Portkey Office.
